sentence.Network_en: Miscue - incorrect striking of the cue ball.
sentence.Network_cn: 滑杆–击打主球时的失误杆.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(M) ... miscreated 残废的 miscue 撞歪 misdata 错误数据.
滑杆(MISCUE) 球杆打主球时,由于打滑导致失误。通常由于没有打在主球击点安全区内,或由于杆头没有打滑粉所致。 空杆(MISS) 在斯诺克比赛中,空杆是指击球手.
古德曼利用错误的线索（miscues）的方法来研究阅读的过程。他研究年幼的儿童阅读过程并记录他们所发生的错误。

means.word_mean: 1. a faulty shot in billiards; the cue tip slips off the cue ball
2. a minor inadvertent mistake usually observed in speech or writing or in small accidents or memory lapses etc.

auth_sentence.content: C. officials claim, that one miscue is enough to reopen the question of an independent counsel.
auth_sentence.res_content: C. officials claim, that one miscue is enough to reopen the question of an independent counsel.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: C. officials claim, that one miscue is enough to reopen the question of an independent counsel.
